Like: 
-Very simple gunplay: No fancy optics (Aside from certain rifles), under-barrel attachments, or even aiming down sights!
-Cool skins
-Community servers are lively and creative, more playtime past the base game
-Balanced guns and maps
-Great online community and active pro scene
Dislike: 
-Hard for new players to play with higher ranked friends: Encourages smurfing (Games like Battlefield and Call of Duty do not have this problem as they do not have a competitive ranked game.
-Map pool is very limited for competitive and stays stale for months, game does not encourage long time players to go to other maps
